Description: Individual Men should use this activity number to register themselves if they are interested in getting picked up by a men's basketball team. The following information will be needed when you register:1. position(s) you play; 2. level of play 3. phone # 4. email address. This list will be emailed out to all the Men's Basketball Managers to see if their team needs additional players. There is no cost with the Recreation Department. Any fees should be worked out with the team that picks you up. The Recreation Department does not guarantee being placed on a team.

ActivityName: Coach Parker Basketball Academy Spring Break
Description: Coach Parker Basketball Academy is a premier camp for young athletes of all skill levels. The academy focuses on skill development, individual offense, defense and team strategies. This fun-filled camp features daily morning grind skill sessions, games, team building activities and sessions designed to help students learn concepts of the game.

ActivityName: Adult Basketball - Women's Drop In Basketball
Description: Women's Drop In basketball is a non-competitive, drop-in basketball program, just for women. Teams are made up of individuals and play pick-up games. A staff person will run a clock and keep score for all games. A great way to meet new people and have fun! All skill levels encouraged. Location is at Bauer Community Center. Starts Sunday mornings, April 3 and ends Sunday, May 22, 10:00 am to 12:00pm. There is a 8 week session. No games on April 17 and May 30.
